data.title: First time
data.text: This was the first time we've ordered here and let me tell you we will definitely be ordering again.  We had the 14in pan pepperoni Pizza and garlic bread... it was fantastic...

data.title: Pizza
data.text: I have to say this is one of the best pizzas we have ever eaten.  We were at a local hotel and had called for delivery.  They were right on time.  But the best part was the pizza.  Thin crust  lots of meat and the sauce was terrific.

data.title: Good Pizza!
data.text: My family and I ordered Brizio from our hotel room twice, and both the food and service is very good. The times we got Brizio, we ordered a large pizza (1/2 sausage, 1/2 pepperoni), and garlic bread. We definitely plan on having it again!

data.title: Best Pizza EVER
data.text: I love pizza and this place is so wonderful! Super delicious and non-greasy  deep dish. The thin crust is good too - you can order online and get a special for online which is all the toppings you want for one price - but only if you order online. They are speedy and very customer friendly. The cheese is the best quality ever. I always get extra cheese cuz it's so great. If you dine here, or get delivery, you will be very, very happy!

data.title: Best service
data.text:
The best and most friendly service possible in Lake Forest
Was presented by brizio
Second, our family kitchen correctly
I enjoy being there

data.title: Outstanding pizza!
data.text: We use this for our Company functions. Reasonable prices. Any pizza is great. All are very tasty and crust is just right!

data.title: Best Pizza in Lake Forest
data.text: Brizio is the pizza of choice in our house.  It isn't as cheap as some of the chain pizza stores, but if you are looking for  quality ingredients and good cheese and crust this is the spot.

data.title: Zero star
data.text: I wish I could put zero star too, but there is no option for it, terrible, nasty, unhealthy and oily pizzas ever with a dirty place.

data.title: Good food. Good eats. Friendly staff
data.text: I love their sauce.  Their pizzas are tasty.  Meatball sandwich is very good - though they don't put enough meat on a regular sandwich.  Comfy seating.  I'm a regular.

data.title: Pizza that you will come back for with a smile.
data.text: While on a road trip, wife an I were spending a few days in Lake Forest, Ca.  We like that area---beach is nearby, Saddleback Church is in the area, and there are some really good food places------many are moderately priced and good.  Brizio Pizza is one of those.  A loaded medium for $12 is all 2 people could want-----Friendly mgr took care of us, and made sure we had everything we needed------A really good pizza-----take it out or eat there-----either way you win.

data.title: Pizza is eh..
data.text: Friendly service.  I love the idea of having a "treasure chest" for little kids to open and get a toy.  Pizza here is not my fav unfortunately.  Kinda has that deep dish crust, which I don't like but thats just my own taste.

data.title: Great pizza, fair prices, fast delivery
data.text: Tiny restaurant with several tables, and large, busy kitchen. Best pizza crust ever, generously topped with vast choice of quality toppings. A truly special dining treat for those used to the indifferent product of many large chains.

data.title: The Best Pizza Ever!!!
data.text: Brizio Pizza always supports fund raisers for local schools. It is just a small restaurant on Lake Forest Blvd. My kids were always telling us to go to Brizio Pizza. I thought it was to participate in the School  Fund Raiser. The truth was, that the pizza was the Best Pizza my kids (11 and 8) had ever tasted.  We finally listened to them and went to Brizio Pizza.... Boy my kids were RIGHT... The sauce is homemade,... it just tastes better then any other Pizza..... Try it and you will see what all the kids have been saying for years!!!!

data.title: Pizza was awesome
data.text: Great pizza. Quick delivery. First time ordering it and was very happy with the quality and taste. Would recommend.

data.title: Gluten free pizza
data.text:
The gluten free pizza is Ironically good. Just trying out this little shop on the way home and it was quite delicious. Went with black olives and mushrooms although I usually have a meat pizza with a regular gluten-filled crust. It was very flavorful and tasted like normal pizza. This time I shared dinner and had a Montejo beer which was crisp and cold. 
Had dinner out on the sidewalk because it is pet friendly location. The delivery people are very friendly, especially the girl who greeted our dog kindly. Prices are reasonable and the location is convenient. the sidewalk eating is limited and close to the parking which lacks ambiance but gets the job done.

data.title: Average food, nothing special
data.text:
Nothing here i can't get much better at other pizzeria's..I had food delivered to me - did not eat there. Sauce on meatball sandwich tasted like it was mostly generic tomato paste straight from can, absence of spices very noticeable. Served as 4 quarter to half dollar sized meatballs-not sliced- in a uninspired very bland white bread "italian" roll, 

Individual pan pizza ($4.65 for plain cheese with 60 cents per additional topping. The size was like--the smallest I have ever seen.(about bread plate size) , less than 1/4 inch crust -and topping/cheese with two other items didn't add another 1/4 to 1/2 inch in height and toppings were almost non-existent at that and in tiny bits-, very chewy and bland crust- very disappointing. 

Cheesecake touted as "3.50 a slice" dessert- was smaller slice than I have gotten elsewhere with dinner- very very uninspired- and below average in taste in my opinion-as was frankly the whole of the food.   Not worth the $27. I paid by a long shot. (Delivery to a location less than 1/2 mile away was $3.50- ridiculously high for a pizza delivery company in this area. Soft Drink 2 ltr bottle (which sells for 99 cents in local high end groceries) is $3.65! Well above all other pizza and delivery restaurants in the area. 

I will not buy from them again.

data.title: Pizza
data.text: This pizza is great keep coming back for more the pan crust is great nd the wings r god not to spicy nd not to bland...owner is very nice...great customer service jimmy is funny nd very talkative...

data.title: Delicious
data.text: They made the greatest pizza I've EVER had. We were just looking for a place to go with great prices that wasn't a drive through and stumbled on this. This was worth every cent.

data.title: Pizza
data.text: This pizza is good the chicago pan crust is delicious nd the wings r not to spicy but.have a great taste...will recommend to everyone...

data.title: Yummy pizza
data.text: This place is better than pizzahut! Delevered to my hotel and the kids loved it. Didn't try anything else but I can say it gets very hard after a while.. so eat fresh!!
